entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moose Jaw
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Moose Jaw 03:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -16.2°C
Wind: SE 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
